content: The Gore-Eye Daoist is guarding a Luojia Fragrant Vine that you can use to empower your Gourd. Don't forget to pluck it off the tree after absorbing the Gore-Eye Daoist's Spirit.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gore-Eye_Daoist_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Gore-Eye Daoist Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Gore-Eye Daoist Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Gore-Eye Daoist is guarding a Luojia Fragrant Vine that you can use to empower your Gourd. Don't forget to pluck it off the tree after absorbing the Gore-Eye Daoist's Spirit.
